body:
A couple days late but oh well.

 Heres a bit about me and my time with avicus:
- One of the newest Senior Moderators.
- Played Avicus for almost 4 years now.
- Been Staff on/off for a bit over a year.
- Officiated 3 tournaments now.


ASK AWAY!

replies.body:
Opinions?
Good Official, MapDev and Senior Mod. Nice person to talk to and you seem to know what you're doing in most situations.

Was your promotion to sr mod a surprise to you, at all?
Well, everyone suggested me and I was honestly somewhat expecting it. It was sorta a surprise, but then again not really.

You're the only admin/senior moderator I've ever trusted. I've gone to you with so many problems and situations. You're a great friend and hopefully your rainbow six siege kangaroo squad works out :)!

Keep tip: If your team starts to lose replace them all with monkeys.

replies.body:
Opinions?
You're one of the greatest mineman I've ever talked too. I love to make fun of you screaming when your sister is on your internet. You're a super nice/toxic person and I love you zicurI
Why you care about avicus?
Played the server for 4 years, experienced its highs and its lows. Just want to see the server back in its prime.
Best 10 players for you?
Pvp wise? Hmm.. chespie, chespie, chespie, chespie, chespie, elementalassasin, elementalassasin, elementalassasin, elementalassasin, elementalassasin.
On a serious note, I dont know tbh.

replies.body:
Opinions?
Very good moderator, always making good suggestions and attempting to help out the server in anyway.
Would love to see you come back as staff tbh
What are you most excited about now that you're a Senior Mod?
I don't actually know tbh, there is a few things that are happening at the moment, but I honestly think it might be being able to work with the higher-ups and even help the mentors/juniors.

I don't actually know tbh, there is a few things that are happening at the moment, but I honestly think it might be being able to work with the higher-ups and even help the mentors/juniors.

replies.body:
Opinions?
Hardly know you very well, but you're very hardworking and good at your job. You're a nice person in-game but we've never spoken on teamspeak surprisingly.

Weren't you the first in our Senior batch to be promoted?
Well technically Distraction and I were promoted at the same time, but I had Senior Moderator In discord and in-game 30 seconds before. So to answer your question, yes.

Favorite cake?
Ice cream cake!
